title: What is the best Indian classical song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dil ki Tapish from Katyar Kaljhat Ghusli is also goof. Also Sur Sangini from the same movie. They may not be the best songs, but yhey are really good. Also, on another note, if you want to try Classical fusion, Banjara from coke studio would be a good place to start
